text: Lin Chia-yu (; born 30 June 1993) is a Taiwanese male badminton player. In 2011, he won the gold medal at the Asian Junior Championships in men's doubles event partnered with Huang Po-jui. He also won the silver medal at the BWF World Junior Championships. He is married to former doubles partner Hsu Ya- ching. == Achievements == === BWF World Junior Championships === Boys' Doubles {| class="sortable wikitable" style="font-size: 90%;" ! Year ! Venue !
